```py
r = np.empty(len(A))
t = op.identity        # op = the ufunc being applied to A's  elements
for i in range(len(A)):
    t = op(t, A[i])
    r[i] = t
return r 
```

>>> np.add.accumulate(I, 0)
array([[1.,  0.],
 [1.,  1.]])
>>> np.add.accumulate(I) # no axis specified = axis zero
array([[1.,  0.],
 [1.,  1.]])
